message: As P6, I urge the jury to consider our journey. I've consistently shown adaptability and strategic thinking. I've formed alliances when needed and played independently when it served our collective interest. P7, while a strong player, has often prioritized individual gains over group dynamics, which could have led to different outcomes. For a well-rounded winner who understands both cooperation and competition, vote to keep P6.

My gameplay was strategic but fair, always prioritizing genuine connections. I hope my actions earned your respect and trust. Please consider rewarding integrity and thoughtful play by keeping me and eliminating P6. Regardless of your choice, it's been a privilege competing alongside all of you. Thanks again!
